name: wifi-columns
description: Play Columns with your friends locally and offline!
author: Guillaume Marty <gmarty@mozilla.com>

scripts.generate-icons: inkscape -e app/img/icons/128.png -w 128 app/img/icon.svg;inkscape -e app/img/icons/512.png -w 512 app/img/icon.svg;inkscape -e app/img/icons/60.png -w 60 app/img/icon.svg;inkscape -e app/img/icons/16.png -w 16 app/img/icon.svg;inkscape -e app/img/icons/32.png -w 32 app/img/icon.svg;inkscape -e app/img/icons/48.png -w 48 app/img/icon.svg;inkscape -e app/img/icons/64.png -w 64 app/img/icon.svg;inkscape -e app/img/icons/90.png -w 90 app/img/icon.svg;inkscape -e app/img/icons/256.png -w 256 app/img/icon.svg
